name: codechallenge
description: Processing customer tasks from a todo list

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js
scripts.fifo: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js
scripts.round: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js round
scripts.balanced: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js balanced

author: Stephanie Verlingo
